reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate for mitochondrial encephalomyopathies summing major subtypes: MELAS (~0.5 per 100k births), MERRF (~0.3 per 100k births), Leigh syndrome (~0.4 per 100k births), other mitochondrial cytopathies (~0.3 per 100k). Total ~1.5 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, limited epidemiological data, and variable reporting across populations.
